name: Stage 1
desc: No special rule for this stage

name: Stage 3
desc: No special rule for this stage

name: Stage 4
desc: No special rule for this stage

name: Stage 5
desc: Special Rule: all your Rangers have their Attack reduced by 50%

name: Stage 6
desc: Special Rule: all your Priests have their maximum HP reduced by 40%

name: Stage 7
desc: Special Rule: all your Girls are Silenced in the first 3 rounds of the battle

name: Stage 8
desc: Special Rule: all your Girls have their Heal Received reduced by 75%

name: Stage 9
desc: Special Rule: all your enemies heal themselves by 10% of their maximum HP at the end of each round

name: Stage 10
desc: Special Rule: all your enemies are Immune to all debuffs

name: Time Vortex
desc: The highest damage you deal in a challenge attempt will be displayed on a ranking board. Tap the button on the right to check out.
